comment1.text: I've visited the site and the location is excellent. Good road access and the owner is motivated to sell quickly.

comment2.text: The distance from Harare concerns me. Most members work in the city and this would add significant commute time.

comment3.text: Can we get more details on the subdivision permit process? This seems like a critical factor.

comment4.text: Commercial development first makes sense financially, but we need to ensure member satisfaction.

comment5.text: I think residential plots should come first. Members have been waiting and deserve priority.
